# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

add_subdirectory(protos)
add_subdirectory(scheme)
add_subdirectory(storage)
add_subdirectory(changes)
add_subdirectory(portions)
add_subdirectory(loading)
add_subdirectory(predicate)
add_subdirectory(reader)
add_subdirectory(writer)

add_library(tx-columnshard-engines)


target_compile_options(tx-columnshard-engines PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(tx-columnshard-engines PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  tools-enum_parser-enum_serialization_runtime
  libs-apache-arrow
  ydb-core-base
  ydb-core-formats
  ydb-core-protos
  ydb-core-scheme
  ydb-core-tablet
  ydb-core-tablet_flat
  tx-columnshard-common
  columnshard-engines-changes
  columnshard-engines-loading
  columnshard-engines-portions
  columnshard-engines-predicate
  columnshard-engines-protos
  columnshard-engines-reader
  columnshard-engines-storage
  tx-columnshard-tracing
  core-tx-program
  udf-service-exception_policy
)

target_sources(tx-columnshard-engines PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/metadata_accessor.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/column_engine_logs.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/column_engine.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/db_wrapper.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/filter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/defs.cpp
)


generate_enum_serilization(tx-columnshard-engines
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/column_engine_logs.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  contrib/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/column_engine_logs.h
)
